welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Anserma, Colombia! Get ready to experience the charm of our beautiful city, known for its stunning landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Anserma has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Matecana Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Matecana Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Matecana Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
